website_summaries.verdict: A rugged, weather-proof box for serious tool users who want to protect their gear. Pricey, but worth it.
pros: Solid steel with no spot welding
Box can be reconfigured for different tools
cons: Extremely heavy when packed with tools
Designed for commercial use, not for casual repairs

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Disappointed after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Best tool box I have ever owned! Worth every penny! Update 3 months in and it completely fell apart- a lot of money for something so poorly built. Not for everyday use at all!
customer_reviews.author: John price

customer_reviews.title: Not what is listed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the tool box with the notion that the many measurements listed would be close to what I was needing but found out that it is no where in the ballpark. Study for the thin plastic that it is made of. Storage they need to be more precise on their measurements. I have not gotten to use it because I sent it back the same day I got it. I wish I could add more and be more beneficial. Pictures provide the measurements that I was concerned with. Hope some of this helps.
customer_reviews.author: JoniBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great box for shop and travel work
customer_reviews.text: I am a fabricator and I sometimes travel.This box feels as if I designed it myself.Got room for big tools as well as small sockets and bits.Reason I purchased is for access to every level at once.Perfect for fast access to everything and perfect for staying organized.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to open and close
customer_reviews.text: much smoother operation than I expected, I am partially paralyzed on my left side and I am able to slide this box open and closed easily. I highly recommend this toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Dave h

customer_reviews.title: impressively rugged and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This toolbox makes a perfect chuck box for camping. Top bin for utensils, bottom for pans/plates, and middle for seasoning and other things. I love it! It opens/closes smoothly, even with a lot of weight in it. The latches close securely, so I never wonder about the lid opening accidentally. The handle raises easily and gives good leverage for moving the toolbox around.
customer_reviews.author: GunNut37086

customer_reviews.title: Ok for light items
customer_reviews.text: It’s not really sturdy at all, now if you are using it for light small stuff. It may work for you. Mine came broken, not sellers fault but shippings fault. I hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F. Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as my camping kitchen and I love it! It's been on several adventures and holds everything nicely and is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: Like the storage capabilities,just can't be ruffwith it. Its serves its job.
customer_reviews.author: paul V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, portable box. Toolbox is subjective. Just depends on what tools you want in it. If you need heavy duty tools, I would not recommend this, I am using it to carry all my vehicle paint detailing tools, which it is perfect for. The load is not as heavy as if I were on a construction site. I like it for my needs, excellent. For heavy tools, not so much, in my opinion. I would not recommend this for construction workers with heavy tools. It just a little to "light" for a heavy load. Gave it 4 stars for this reason, but for lighter loads, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: A stand up box!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. I use for my DJ accessories, stands, cords, power cables, table cloths, lights. It only takes a up a tiny bit of space compared to the my old flat tote. I should be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jared May

customer_reviews.title: Won't last longer than a year with daily use
customer_reviews.text: I love all the storage configurations possible I don't like the cheap way it's made
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item 10 years ago and it was wonderful. Just purchased our second box and it was broke in 2 days. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: camper

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy how much it can hold, it eliminated the need for two tool boxes and I enjoy the fold out feature. The handle does seem a little weak but holding on so far.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Long wait and arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item after waiting three weeks and it arrived damaged! The back wheels are loose in the metal bar is bent.
customer_reviews.author: Johna Graff

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: plenty of room for larger tools in lower comparator....the middle could be split into multiple areas of storage.....the rest so far I have no no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the product and service that was provided for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Auble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!! I bought the product as a gift to my fiance and love it and believe he will enjoy it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany RaShae Avance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool box
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I’ve owned, first one got destroyed by thieves on a job site 😕
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Large storage space
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect mobile storage tool box for any job requiring you to move with several hand tools
customer_reviews.author: Jerime Clarke

customer_reviews.title: practcal
customer_reviews.text: again i just like the easy way to handle it
customer_reviews.author: Handy Randy

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my car wash supplies.
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and easy to use. It pulls open easily without having to drag anything. I keep gloves, dirty rags on the top, spray bottles and soaps in the middle portion, and bigger soap bottles, foam cannons, tools on the bottom with more packs of MF towels. It holds more than what I need for cleaning my car, which I have recently become obsessed with keeping clean and swirl free since it is so expensive. Price is reasonable for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bignami

customer_reviews.title: Great chuck box
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use as a chuck box for car camping. It is perfect for that. We have out spatulas, ladles, knives, aluminum foil, etc in the top compartment flatware, spices and other odds and ends in the center, and pots, pans, skillets and metal camp dishes in the bottom. Its heavy when loaded, but the wheels help a lot if you don't have a long way to go. We use it a few times a year, family camping and music festivals. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Skully Enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Head End Cable Battle Station
customer_reviews.text: This bad boi is almost lasting 3 years. Makes a portable battle station so I do not have to make extra trips to the work truck. Made use of the ceiling in the main compartment to hold some common use tools. Wish it would have held up better at the corners, might fix it up with some extra strength tape to maybe hold it together for an extra year... Also, will need to replace one of the wheels soon, I wonder if I can even find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Hepheastus

customer_reviews.title: Built very good, easy to roll.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping. Perfect to put all my metal dishes, pans and small grill in bottom draw. Put metal cups, bowls and food cans in second to the bottom draw. Put utensils and food prep in top draw and was still able to push with ease. I can put in van to take to camp. I was very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Noeltner

customer_reviews.title: Hailno!
customer_reviews.text: POS! Wobbly, weak, underbuilt, not at all water resistant. Spend a little more and get the Milwaukee or Ridgid stackable boxes, you'll be MUCH happier.
customer_reviews.author: Troglodyte

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a few months
customer_reviews.text: Mostly plastic, one of the guides broke after a few uses and now it won't close.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron aka Speedgeek

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Storage for a lot of Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Solid rolling box, useful for a variety of storage situations.
customer_reviews.author: Alliance SoMI

customer_reviews.title: Get almost anything in it long as it's not too much
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and I like it so I'm by my son one
customer_reviews.author: Gairda Gann

product_meta.title: Fatmax Mobile Work Station, 24.8" x 21.6" x 16.2"
